casebody.data:
Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Macurdy.

[Cite as Disciplinary Counsel v. Macurdy (1990), 56 Ohio St. 3d 69.]

(No. 90-997 Submitted July 31, 1990 Decided December 12, 1990.) *70J. Warren Bettis, disciplinary counsel, and Harold F. Craig III, for relator. Per Curiam.

Pursuant to Gov. Bar R. V(44), we disbar respondent from the practice of law in Ohio. Costs taxed to respondent.

Judgment accordingly.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Holmes, Douglas, Wright, H. Brown and Re snick, JJ., concur.
